name: Din Tai Fung
description: Renowned handmade dumplings, plus noodle dishes and soups, doled out in a modern Taiwanese chain.

name: MISO Japanese Restaurant
description: Casual Japanese restaurant popular for its bento boxes, served in a brightly-lit, minimalist space.

name: Burger Project
description: Trendy, health-conscious spot for burgers and housemade ice cream, created by famed chef Neil Perry.

name: Per Thai Restaurant
description: Contemporary design Thai restaurant with a relaxed vibe, stool seating and spherical light fixtures.
